amendment.description: To provide that none of the funds appropriated or made available under this Act may be used to implement proposed regulations relating to the detail of executive branch employees to the legislative branch, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1949 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1949 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S13120-13121; text: CR S13120) To provide that none of the funds appropriated or made available under this Act may be used to implement proposed regulations relating to the detail of executive branch employees to the legislative branch, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1949 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1949 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Grassley.
